title: Customer Service Practical Competency Enhancement: Immersive Experiential Eco-Psychology STEAM Education Design Based on Mixed Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts, STEAM education principles, and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design experiential lessons that visually and tactually represent mathematical concepts using XR technology.
Learners can develop learner-centered interactive mathematics education scenarios by applying ecological psychology theories.
Learners can present three or more integrated approaches to science, engineering, art, and mathematics through STEAM education.
Learners can design a method to measure educational effectiveness using formative assessment tools in mixed reality environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
